translation.en: [man] Excuse me, uh, this may sound crazy,

translation.en: but I couldn't help but notice you from across the room.
translation.zh: 我在房间的另一头忍不住看你

translation.en: -Hello. -Hi.
Love your smell.
-I brought you something. -What'd you get me?
translation.zh: -我给你带了点东西-你给我带了什么？

translation.en: -What'd I get you? -Hm? What'd I get you?
-My favorite! Oh! -Mm-hm.
Why eat regular when you can go Tropical?
translation.zh: 热带口味比经典口味好吃多了

translation.en: -Yeah, Tropical. -Mm-hm!
All right, what you got? -What you been drawing? -Mm!
translation.zh: 好的 这是什么？你在画什么？

translation.en: -Oh! -Not yet.
Is Bhoomi finally ready to become a butterfly?
translation.zh: 布米终于要变成蝴蝶了吗？

translation.en: -No. -Uh-huh. She's perfectly fine just as she is.
translation.zh: 不 她现在这样就很好

translation.en: -Stop trying to change her. -All right.
So Roxy's tonight?
-Or I was thinking... -Mm-hm?
how about we stay in and I can cook?
translation.zh: 待在家里 我来做饭 怎么样？

translation.en: -No, thanks. -What do you mean?
Baby, come on, you think I'll let you back in the kitchen after last time?

translation.en: Wait a minute, that was your mom's branzino recipe.

translation.en: -Your favorite. -I don't know what that was.
translation.zh: -是你的最爱-很难说那是什么菜

translation.en: Never cooking for you again.
Thank you.
I got to go.
-Why? -Gotta go.
-I got a meeting. -Don't go.
Babe, you know I'll be thinking about you.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你知道我会想你的

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
[Mira] I knew you were here the whole time.
translation.zh: 我一直都知道你在这里

translation.en: Twist ending. How?
translation.zh: 真是大逆转 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Well, I could feel you.
Also, I could see you in that reflection with my eyes.
translation.zh: 而且我能用眼睛看到倒影里的你

translation.en: -[laughs] -Damn, I look good!
[Mira] Oh, that's just an artist's touch.
translation.zh: -那只是画家的美化-你很幸运

translation.en: -You're a lucky lady. -I am. I'll see you later?
translation.zh: -那只是画家的美化-你很幸运 当然 晚点见？

translation.en: -Love you so much. -Love you.
-Bye. -Bye.
-[man 1] Hey, look out! -[crashing and thudding]
[woman] Oh, my God!
[man 2] Get help!
[woman on recording] Hey, it's your sister, doing my daily check-in.
translation.zh: 我是你妹妹 照例每天打电话问问

translation.en: How's it going today? How's Mom and Dad?
translation.zh: 今天怎么样？爸爸妈妈怎么样？

translation.en: Wanna give me a call and catch up?

translation.en: -Ma? -[answering machine beeps]
[on recording] Suzy again. You know what? You didn't call me back, but that's fine.

translation.en: Papa?
What do you do with Mom and Dad at night there?
translation.zh: 你晚上跟爸爸妈妈在家里做什么？

translation.en: I'm just curious.
Do you guys hang out and watch British Bake Off?

translation.en: [Suzy on recording] I know you're still grieving,
but I just wanted to say I really miss you.
translation.zh: 但我想说 我真的很想你

translation.en: [on recording] Hey, it's Suzy again.
Like the new drawings. Little dark, though. Don't you think?
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的新画作就是有点黑暗 你不觉得吗？ （布米希望你不要再跟她聊蝴蝶了）

translation.en: Maybe you should come back to the city, to your room,
translation.zh: （布米希望你不要再跟她聊蝴蝶了） 也许你应该回到城里回到我们的公寓里

translation.en: which is empty, in our apartment?
translation.zh: 回到你那个空荡荡的房间里？

translation.en: [Suzy on recording] Mira, enough.
You know I'm not great with words, but John loved you.
translation.zh: 你知道我不善言辞 但约翰那么爱你

translation.en: And I'm sure he would not wanna see you stuck like this.
translation.zh: 他一定不想看到你这样不可自拔 （固执的毛毛虫布米整天睡觉）

translation.en: Mom and Dad want their house back!
translation.zh: 爸爸妈妈想要回他们的房子！

translation.en: Do I have to come and get you?
-Bye, Papa. -Bye, beta.

translation.en: -Drive safely. -I will. Bye, Mom.

translation.en: -Okay. I got it. Bye. -[Mom in English] Bye.
translation.zh: 好 我没问题的 再见

translation.en: -[Papa] Bye. -[Mom] Bye.
-See you, Mom. -[Mom] Bye.
[Papa] Tell Suzy she needs to text her parents back.
I will.
She's here!
I can't believe you're still driving John's truck.
translation.zh: 你竟然还在开约翰的卡车

translation.en: It still smells like him.
Oh! Come here.
-No, I get the top. -Ah!
-I'm stronger than you. -Okay.
I'm really happy you're doing this.
translation.zh: 你回来了 我真的很高兴

translation.en: Shit.
Oh, shit.
[sighs] Shit.
Céline Dion?
Like...
Like, "My Heart Still Goes On," that Céline Dion?
translation.zh: 唱《我心永远》的那个席琳·迪翁？

translation.en: Too commercial for you, is it, huh?

translation.en: If you kept up with what the kids were saying,
translation.zh: 你要是能跟上现在的潮流

translation.en: you'd know we were in the middle of a Célinaissance.

translation.en: Drake is talking about getting a tattoo of her face.
translation.zh: 连德雷克都说要把她的脸纹在身上

translation.en: -What? How do you know that? -Instagram.
translation.zh: -什么？你怎么知道的？-看照片墙

translation.en: I should be starting the podcast for the newspaper.

translation.en: No, what you should be doing is leaving my office

translation.en: to go work on Céline Dion.
Now, you seem to forget, Rob,
that I've taken a big chance hiring you, fellow Brit.

translation.en: But ever since you were publicly humiliated by that woman--

translation.en: Elizabeth.
Ever since Elizabeth dropped you like a stone
just days before your wedding, well, your work has lacked heart.

translation.en: Céline Dion is all about heart. Okay?

translation.en: People adore her. I adore her.

translation.en: So get onboard, or I'll find someone who will.

translation.en: Shut up. It was the only one I could find.

translation.en: It's just five. I'm gonna lose this game.

translation.en: Aw! Bernard wrote back.
Bernard's back in the picture, huh?
Mm... Not quite sure.
But he wrote, "See you soon, dot, dot, dot."

translation.en: With a winky smiley. Means he wants to see me.

translation.en: I don't know about that. Sounds like a blow-off to me.

translation.en: What? No. Winky smiley.

translation.en: That's, like, way more-- [purrs] --like, meaningful than, like, a regular smiley.

translation.en: You know what's crazy, Suzy?

translation.en: Our parents worked their asses off to send us to college,

translation.en: and here we are, decoding the winky in a smiley.

When they put the fries inside the burger.
-[Mo chuckles] -Mo, you named a burger after me?

I name burgers after all my favorite customers.

translation.en: -You, not so much. -[Suzy chuckles]

translation.en: How you holding up?
-You know. -[Mo] Yeah.
Takes a long time.
Yeah. I still have a ways to go, I think.

translation.en: Well, you know, there's no clock.
God knows, I...
I still miss Roxy every day.
How do you deal with it, Mo?
Pour a glass of wine, sit down for dinner,

translation.en: and tell her about my day.

translation.en: Just because she's gone doesn't mean I can't still tell her about my feelings.

translation.en: The ice, it thickens.
Someday, it'll support your weight.

translation.en: I promise.
[Céline singing] ♪ ...strong again somehow ♪
♪ And I never wasted any of my time ♪
♪ On you since then... ♪
♪ But if I touch you like this ♪
♪ And if you kiss me like that ♪
♪ It was so long ago But it's all coming back-- ♪

translation.en: You're lucky. I love Céline.

No. I have a phone.
No, you have a personal phone.
This is a work phone, issued by our new corporate overlords.

I took the phone! Take the phone. It's not a choice.

-Fine, fine. -Yeah. Uh, be careful.
There's a rumor Hughes is tracking everything we say and do on that.

When are you going to text Jessica?

translation.en: I told her you would. It's kind of rude to keep her waiting.

translation.en: -I told you, I'm not looking to date. -[Lisa] Why not?

translation.en: You're, like, peaking physically.
You don't wanna be out there when you're on the decline.

translation.en: Yeah, she's right. You know, just let me set you up.

translation.en: -You're not even on the apps anymore. -Love isn't real. It--
translation.zh: -你甚至不用约会软件了-爱情不是真实的 那…

translation.en: It's just a bunch of pheromones that wear off.
translation.zh: 不过是一堆费洛蒙 最终总会消退

translation.en: Then you get your heart ripped out,
covered in bleach, stomped on,
translation.zh: 被涂上漂白剂 被踩在脚下

translation.en: set on fire in front of your friends and your family and...
translation.zh: 在朋友和家人面前被火烧

translation.en: Hey, boo. Any reason you left these things out in the truck?

translation.en: Well, his mom gave them to me.
I just never opened it.
What? Wait. No. Suzy.

translation.en: Come on, it's been two years.

translation.en: If you weren't my sister, I'd probably be like, "Whoa, easy there, girl,"

translation.en: but, nah, I totally get it.
Orpheus and Eurydice?
He used to play that for me all the time,
said that he'd go to hell and back for me.
translation.zh: 说他愿意为我赴汤蹈火 在所不辞

translation.en: That's what the opera's about.

translation.en: Oh, God. He was the best.
He never got the chance.
Okay. This, I don't know, feels a little unhealthy, maybe?

translation.en: What's wrong with it?
I'm just wearing my dead boyfriend's shirt

translation.en: and the engagement ring he never got to give me.

translation.en: Come here.
Okay.
Okay.
Hey, John.
This is just weird. God.
[man on TV] Leans in and he scores!
-Knicks within two. -Yes.

translation.en: Hey, John...
I miss you so much.
[man] Over Barrett. No!
Yes! -Come on. -[thunder rumbles]
Yes!
What?
Oh-- What the hell?
[man 1 on TV] --find Randle.
-Randle... Oh! -[man 2] No!
[man 1] A heartbreaker for the Knicks tonight. Come on.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -Sorry.
translation.zh: （你本该谁在我身边的那个位置） -对不起-对不起

translation.en: Interesting.
Is she using the leaf to blot her tears?
Well, it would be weird to give her a tissue.
Look, Mira.
We make children's books here.
translation.zh: 我们这里制作的是儿童书籍

translation.en: Children. Remember them?
Little people who like to look at bright pictures and laugh.
translation.zh: 那些小矮人喜欢看着鲜艳的图片发笑

translation.en: Well, maybe it's better to prepare them.
translation.zh: 也许最好让他们做好准备

translation.en: That life will inevitably crush their hopes and dreams.
translation.zh: 生活难免会粉碎他们的希望和梦想

translation.en: They tell us not to pressure creatives.
translation.zh: 虽然说不要给创作者压力

translation.en: But after two years, I think I'm allowed to put a little on you.
translation.zh: 但已经过了两年我想我可以给你加一点压力了

translation.en: Molly, could you come in here, please?
translation.zh: 莫莉 你能进来一下吗？

translation.en: Yes, Ms. Valentine?
translation.zh: 什么事 瓦伦丁女士？

translation.en: Mira, this is Molly.
-Hi. -Big fan.
Molly's a paid intern from NYU.
translation.zh: 莫莉是纽约大学的带薪实习生

translation.en: Scholarship kid.
Raised by a single mom.
That's amazing.
She'll lose her job if you don't figure this out
translation.zh: 如果你不解决这个问题交出一些我们能出版的东西

translation.en: and turn in something we can publish.
Oh. And I'll have to sue for your advance as well.
translation.zh: 我还要起诉你支取定金

translation.en: Thank you, Molly.
[whispers] Player.
Hey.
[clears throat] Lisa. Uh...
Do you wanna talk?
Maybe somewhere private?
Okay.
Look, first of all, I want to say I'm flattered, really.
translation.zh: 首先 我想说我受宠若惊 真的

translation.en: It takes a lot of guts to share your feelings with someone and...

translation.en: What?
Hey, uh...
"It's crazy to reach out like this"?
"We should be together."
Oh, my God. Gross.
Rob, you could be, like, my dad.
translation.zh: 罗伯 你可以当我爸爸了

translation.en: I'm, like, 35. [whispers] I'm 35.
-Ugh. -Not much older than you are.
I'm pretty cool.
Yeah, whatever. I just thought--
-You didn't send me a text? -What text?
No way. I don't flirt like that. I'm, like, good at it.
translation.zh: 不可能 我不会那样调情我的招数高明多了

translation.en: I think they're nice.
Oh!
translation.zh: （我一直闻你的衬衫气味开始消散了）

translation.en: Whoa, that's super sad.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是太悲伤了

translation.en: Who is sending me these texts?
Someone's smishing you.
Phishing, but by text.
translation.zh: 是网络钓鱼 通过短信

translation.en: First, they lure you in, then they ask for your credit card number.
translation.zh: 首先他们引你上钩然后要你的信用卡号码

translation.en: -Delete it. -Yeah.
Céline, you're arguably more popular today than when you started.
translation.zh: 席琳 你现在可以说比你出道的时候更受欢迎

translation.en: How do you think you've managed to stay relevant for so long?
translation.zh: 你认为你是如何保持乐坛常青树的地位呢？

translation.en: Hm. What a question.
Do you ever stop and ask yourself
why people continue to read your work as a middle-aged male journalist?
translation.zh: 你是否曾扪心自问为什么人们继续读你的作品？

translation.en: Maybe it's because if the work is good, it's timeless. Yeah?
translation.zh: 也许是因为优秀的作品永不过时 是吧？

translation.en: Miss Dion, it's been over a decade since you've toured in the States.
translation.zh: 迪翁小姐 你上次在美国巡演已经是十多年前的事了

translation.en: I'm curious. Why now?
translation.zh: 我很好奇 为什么现在再开一次？

translation.en: For five years, it's been tough.
translation.zh: 这五年来我过得很艰辛

translation.en: Raising my children after the loss of their father,
translation.zh: 我抚养孩子们成长 他们失去了父亲

translation.en: the love of my life, my husband, Réne.
translation.zh: 我失去了一生挚爱 我的丈夫 雷内

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes] -And at the same time,
I didn't want to just sit around and be sad.
translation.zh: 我不想只是坐在那里难过

translation.en: So I decided to hit the road and do what I love.
translation.zh: 所以我决定踏上旅程 做我热爱的事 （917-167-5309心不在焉时 时间过得真慢）

translation.en: Tell me about it.
What was that?
Nothing. Just-- I was responding to a text.
translation.zh: 没什么 我只是在回短信

translation.en: -Sorry. -Oh. Cool.
Feel free to talk with friends if I'm boring you.
translation.zh: 如果我让你觉得无聊你可以和朋友们聊聊

translation.en: No, no, no, it wasn't-- I mean...
I wouldn't say it was a friend.
Do you have a question for me?
Yes. Yeah, yeah. Sure.
Miss Dion...
Céline, you sing a lot about love, obviously.
translation.zh: 席琳 你唱了很多关于爱的歌

translation.en: For example, in "That's the Way It Is," you say:
translation.zh: 比如在《就是这样》里 你唱道

translation.en: "When you're ready to go and your heart's left in doubt,
translation.zh: “当你准备好出发 但内心充满疑惑

translation.en: don't give up on your faith, love comes to those that believe it."
translation.zh: 不要放弃你的信仰爱会降临在相信它的人身上”

translation.en: But in "When I Fall in Love,"
you say, "In a restless world like this, love is ended...
translation.zh: 你唱道：“在这样不安定的世界里爱情在开始之前

translation.en: before it's begun."
What's the question?
Well, do you really believe in all these things you sing?
translation.zh: 你真的相信你唱的那些内容吗？

translation.en: You obviously know nothing about it.
What?
Love.
[man] Céline, are you taking your children on tour with you?
translation.zh: 席琳 你要带孩子们去巡演吗？

translation.en: Who are you texting?
No one.
This the same "no one" that you were texting last night?
translation.zh: 是你昨晚发短信的那位“没有谁”吗？

translation.en: Yes, actually.
But trust me, it's totally not what you think.
translation.zh: 但相信我 完全不是你想的那样

translation.en: Mira, there is nothing wrong
translation.zh: 米拉 重新回归情场

Well, see ya.

song lyrics.

before it's even begun.

-[groans] I'm sorry. I'm just... -No, no.

Mira.
